original_text: And the men in the ambush rose quickly out of their place, and as soon as he had stretched out his hand, they ran and entered the city and captured it. And they hurried to set the city on fire.
korean_text: 그의 손을 드는 순간에 복병이 그들의 자리에서 급히 일어나 성읍으로 달려 들어가서 점령하고 곧 성읍에 불을 놓았더라

sentences.original_text: And the men in the ambush rose quickly out of their place
sentences.korean_translation: 매복하고 있던 사람들이 자기 자리에서 빨리 일어나서

sentences.original_text: and as soon as he had stretched out his hand
And they hurried to set the city on fire.
